document_data.name: Ganilon
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ganilon''' was a [[doomguide]] who lived in the city of [[Neverwinter]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I suppose I should be thankful any of us made it through this, it was a trap.|Ganilon, upon being rescued by an [[adventurer]].}}
document_data.History:
After being assigned to [[Neverdeath Graveyard]], ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Ganilon and his fellow doomguides were lured into an area referred to as [[the Rift]] and assaulted by [[Red Wizard]]s and their undead minions. While some of the [[Kelemvor]]ites were killed, Ganilon, [[Severin]], and [[Winlof]] were all being in crypt's in the [[Pauper's Field]] cemetery of Neverdeath under the orders of [[Valindra Shadowmantle]], so they could be used for dark [[Thay]]an ''[[ritual]]''s.

Ganilon was rescued by an [[adventurer]] who was hired by the senior doomguide, [[Volahk]]. Ganilon was the last of the group to be rescued.
